biotools.summary: A program to compute FDR q-values of genome-wide SNP association analysis within each stratum. Especialy the SFDR program is taylored to directly use genome-wide linkage scan results to assign strata. Weighted FDR q-values can be also computed as an alternative to SFDR.

bioschemas.name: SFDR
bioschemas.summary: A program to compute FDR q-values of genome-wide SNP association analysis within each stratum. Especialy the SFDR program is taylored to directly use genome-wide linkage scan results to assign strata. Weighted FDR q-values can be also computed as an alternative to SFDR.
